title: How to Make a James Bond Vesper Martini

steps.headline: Add ice to a cocktail shaker.
Add the gin, vodka and Lillet to the cocktail shaker.
Shake the ingredients vigorously for about five seconds.
Strain into a deep champagne goblet or cocktail glass.
Twist or bend the lemon twist to squeeze out some citrus oils and rub around the rim of the glass, then drop the twist into the drink.
Add ice to a cocktail shaker.

steps.description: Drop the twist into the drink.

text: Method 1 Add ice to a cocktail shaker.  Add the gin, vodka and Lillet to the cocktail shaker.  Cap the shaker.  Shake the ingredients vigorously for about five seconds.  Strain into a deep champagne goblet or cocktail glass.  Twist or bend the lemon twist to squeeze out some citrus oils and rub around the rim of the glass, then drop the twist into the drink.  Serve and enjoy.  Treuter variation Add ice to a cocktail shaker.  Add the Gordon's Gin, Gilbey's Vodka, Lillet Blanc, and 5 to 10 drops of a prepared quinine "tea" to the cocktail shaker.  Cap the shaker.  Vigorously shake the ingredients within the capped for no less than 15 seconds.  Strain into a deep champagne goblet or large martini glass.  Twist or bend an orange twist to squeeze out some citrus oils and rub around the rim of the glass. Drop the twist into the drink. Serve and enjoy.
